K14sf273_sc:1: Wal_1 vitarkā viditā utpadyaṁte viditās tiṣṭaṁti viditā adhyastaṁgacchaṁti /
K14sf273_sc:2: Wal_2 idam api yūyam ānanda tathāgatasyāścaryādbhutadharmaṁ dhārayata / evam āścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ānanda tathāgataḥ /
K14sf273_sc:3: Wal_3 atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmaṁtrayāmāsa / āgamayānanda yena gandhamādanaṁ caityaṁ tenopasaṁkramiṣyāvaḥ /
K14sf273_sc:4: Wal_4 evaṁ bhadaṁta āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
K14sf273_sc:5: Wal_5 atha bhagavān utthāyāsanād yena gandhamādanaṁ caityaṁ tenopasaṁkramati / āyuṣmān ānando niṣīdanam aṁsenāropya bhagavaṁtaṁ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ … myānulomatayā /
K14sf273_sc:6: Wal_6 atha bhagavāṁ gandhamādanaṁ caityam abhyavagāhya yenānyatamaṁ vṛkṣamūlaṁ tenopasaṁkramati / upasaṁkramya āyuṣmaṁtam ānandam āmaṁtrayāmāsa /
K14sf273_sc:7: Wal_7 prajñapayānandāsmiṁ vṛkṣamūle tathāgatasya niṣīdanaṁ pṛṣṭhī me āglāyati tāṁ tāvad āyāmayiṣye /
K14sf273_sc:8: Wal_8 evaṁ bhadaṁtāyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tasmiṁ vṛkṣamūle bhagavato niṣīdanaṁ prajñapayāmāsa /
K14sf273_sc:9: Wal_9 nyaṣīdad bhagavāṁ prajñapta evāsane /āyuṣmān apy ānando bhagavata ekāṁte nyaṣīdat /
K14sf273_sc:10: Wal_10 niṣadya bhagavāṁ āyuṣmaṁtam ānandam āmantrayāmāsa /
K14sf273_sc:11: Wal_11 yāvaṁta ānanda bhikṣavo gandhamādanaṁ caityam upaniḥśṛtya viharaṁti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipātaya /
K14sf273_sc:12: Wal_12 evaṁ bhadaṁtāyuṣmān ānanda bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvaṁto bhikṣavo gandhamādanaṁ
K14sf273_sc:13: caityam upaniḥṣṛtya viharaṁti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipātayāmāsa / saṁnipātya
K14sf273_sc:15: Wal_13 ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavaṁtam idam avocat /
K14sf273_sc:16: Wal_14 yāvaṁto bhadanta bhikṣavo gandhamādanacaityam upaniḥśṛtya viharaṁti sarve te upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipatitāḥ / yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyate /
K14sf273_sc:17: Wal_15 atha bhagavān utthāyāsanād yenopasthānaśālā tenopasaṁkrānta upasaṁkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat /
K14sf273_sc:19: Wal_17 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo ye mayā dharmāḥ svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṁpadya praveditās
K14sf273_sc:20: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāro ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi
K14sf273_sc:21: pañca balāni sapta bodhyṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ tatra vaḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ
K14sf273_sc:22: saṁmodamānair avivadadbhir ekāgrair ekoddeśair ekakṣīrodakabhūtaiḥ … dīpayamānaiḥ
K14sf273_sc:24: Wal_18 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo ye mayā dharmā ākhyātās tadyathā sūtraṁ geyaṁ vyākaraṇaṁ gāthodānā
K14sf273_sc:26: ca suṣṭhu codgrahītavyā udgṛhya dhārayitavyā dhārayitvā tulayitavyāḥ tulayitvā niśāmayitavyā
K14sf273_sc:28: Wal_19 tat kasmād dhetoḥ / acireṇa tathāgatasya parinirvāṇaṁ bhaviṣyati / trayāṇāṁ māsānām
K14sf273_sc:29: atyayena tathāgatasya parinirvāṇaṁ bhaviṣyati kuśinagaryupavartane mallānāṁ sālavane
K14sf273_sc:31: Wal_20 atha te bhikṣavo bhagavatontikād idaṁ evaṁrūpaṁ vākyaṁ śrutvā ekatyā bhikṣavaḥ cchinnaprapāta … pṛthivyāṁ nipetuś cetobh samarpitāḥ atikṣipraṁ …
